alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Columbiana; Tuscarawas (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 20 at 8:39PM EDT until July 20 at 9:45PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pittsburgh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Columbiana County in east central Ohio... Northern Carroll County in east central Ohio... Northern Tuscarawas County in east central Ohio... Northwestern Beaver County in western Pennsylvania... Southwestern Lawrence County in western Pennsylvania... * Until 945 PM EDT. * At 839 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles southeast of West Salem to 8 miles north of East Palestine, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines, resulting in some power outages. * Locations impacted include... Dover, Salem, Columbiana, East Palestine, Carrollton, Calcutta, Minerva, Ohioville, Lisbon, Strasburg, Leetonia, Industry, New Waterford, Augusta, Malvern, Bolivar, Mineral City, Hanoverton, Rogers, and Parral. This includes Interstate 77 in Ohio between mile markers 85 and 94. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 412-262-1988, posting to the NWS Pittsburgh Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSPITTSBURGH.
